overview:
Dr. Lisa Marcaurelle joined H3 Biomedicine as Vice President of Discovery Chemistry in April 2011, from the Broad Institute, where she was Director of Synthetic Chemistry in the Chemical Biology Platform.

During her four years at the Broad Institute, Lisa established a synthetic platform for the large-scale production of diversity-oriented synthesis (DOS) libraries, generating a collection of more than 100,000 small molecules for use in high-throughput screening. While at the Broad, Lisa also served as a Project Leader for the Harvard/Broad Center for Chemical Methodology (CMLD). Prior to joining the Broad, she worked at Infinity Pharmaceuticals from 2002 to 2007, where she was engaged in the synthesis of numerous DOS libraries and participated in oncology-focused medicinal chemistry efforts.
